extendedInfo.description: Call Recorder is the easiest and fastest way to record phone calls on your android phone. Key features include: â¢ Record phone calls from your phoneâ¢ Save  your recordings on your SD cardâ¢ Record both incoming and outgoing callsHere are some of the cases you might want to use Call Recorder for: â¢ Record important calls and save them for future referenceâ¢ Record a conference call with your co-workers and can further use this voice note as a reference documentâ¢ Interviewing someone over the phone? Call Recorder helps in capturing all the details and store the same as voice note for your future referenceâ¢ Use it on the road to capture important calls

reviews.title: Enable/ Disable feature would be great
reviews.comment: Sound quality is great and the functionality. Enable/ Disable feature will add a better value on top of these. Recording all the calls is a headache some times.
reviews.author: Charith Mallawaarachchi

reviews.title: Useless interface
reviews.comment: Records but cannot scroll down through recordings. Only records a few seconds and annoying adds will make you throw your phone at the wall. Who actually clicks on those pointless adds anyway?
reviews.author: Thomas Swainson

reviews.title: Waste of time
reviews.comment: The recorded amr file looks like it exists, and there is a Play button, but it does not play. I can\'t even find where it saves the file to listen in another app. Samsung S4.
reviews.author: Ronny Krite

reviews.title: Not a good app
reviews.comment: It records ( perhaps ) but the recorder itself not having play-ability of recorded files... sounds funny !!! at least it should minimum facilitate that.
reviews.author: Narendra Navale

reviews.title: awful
reviews.comment: only of its kind let me tell you why that\'s bullcrap I can find plenty of call recorders on the market. Plus none of the files will play whenever I push the play button.
reviews.author: Carson Todd

reviews.title: It works absolutely fine...
reviews.comment: Guys, I have i9250 Samsung, and this is the only recorder which is working over my phone. Maybe it is made for some specific phones so I request creator of this app to post a list of compatible devices so avoid attracting unnecessary negative reviews for a perfectly fine and working app....
reviews.author: SAMIR MADAN

reviews.title: Works, bad UI
reviews.comment: It records the calls, but I can\'t do anything else! The UI is too simple. There isn\'t even a menu to change settings!
reviews.author: Ritesh bantiya

reviews.title: Crap
reviews.comment: Wish I could give it no stars. Doesn\'t do anything. Opened it, had no menu to do anything. Uninstalled, re-installed, same crap.
reviews.author: Michael Schall

reviews.title: Samsung Ace
reviews.comment: It\'s working on my samsung Ace but my voice is too loudly recored comperitivly to others end n play n delete botton not working atall..
reviews.author: jolly papa

reviews.title: Worst worst worst
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t record anything... Even don\'t have any settings. Really \"no other app will be like this\" for android
reviews.author: Manjunath. S Meharwade

reviews.title: Nice icon,  BAD APP!!!
reviews.comment: Why is it in the store? It is garbage. Does not record anything. Does not even look like an app. Should be removed from store.
reviews.author: yud ros

reviews.title: Zero rating
reviews.comment: Like all other android recorder this software also doesn\'t work on Samsung s duos. Only phone side voice is recorded but not the other end. Super flop software in every sense as also get hanged many times during testing. NO NEED TO INSTALL EVEN FOR TRIAL
reviews.author: Munish Bhatheja

reviews.title: DOES NOT WORK AT ALL WASTE OF TIME!!!
reviews.comment: The icon is only fir show
reviews.author: Lenny O

reviews.title: Doesn\'t seem to work
reviews.comment: The app looked promising, has a great looking icon and background and user interface, but it seems like it doesn\'t work at all, it \"seems\" to record every call, but when i go to play them back, the \"play\" and \"delete\" buttons dont do anything, and on top of that, there is no settings, or back button to get to the main menu or call logs, i don\'t think its my phone but will continue to try.... Lol aka this app failed
reviews.author: Jordan Levie

reviews.title: Very bad.. full of spam.
reviews.comment: Its bad application, as soon I download it. It download spam with it.
reviews.author: Yousef Alblooshi

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Superb
reviews.author: JESSO JOSE

reviews.title: Needs a loy of improvement
reviews.comment: It doesn\'t work properly. ...cant even play d recorded calls on my note 2
reviews.author: Krunal Sanghvi

reviews.title: Terrible
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t work at all. Lame.
reviews.author: Steve Myers

reviews.title: V good and it WORKS!!!!
reviews.comment: You can play or delete all your recordings by going to  My files/All files/Trigma
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Samsung galaxy nexus
reviews.comment: Do not work. Apparently record calls but don\'t play back. I connected to a pc and play it but only record microphone.
reviews.author: Ivan De La Cruz
